plentry.pd: (-1): (Default) Auto mode. The SDK automatically selects PREFER_LOW_LATENCY or PREFER_QUALITY based on the video scenario to achieve the best user experience.
(0): Low latency preferred. The SDK compresses video frames to reduce latency, suitable for scenarios requiring smoothness and tolerating lower quality.
(1): High quality preferred. The SDK compresses video frames while maintaining video quality, suitable for scenarios with high quality requirements.
(-1): (Default) Auto mode. The SDK automatically selects PREFER_LOW_LATENCY or PREFER_QUALITY based on the video scenario to ensure optimal user experience.
(0): Low latency priority. The SDK compresses video frames to reduce latency. Suitable for scenarios requiring high smoothness and can tolerate reduced video quality.
(1): High quality priority. The SDK compresses video frames while maintaining video quality. Suitable for scenarios requiring high video quality.
